title: BATTLE IS UPON US - Third Age Total War Gameplay
description:
Can you hear the War Drums in the distance?  Can you feel the earth shake as the army of darkness marches?  The Olog Hai are upon us, and all we can do it FIGHT!  Enjoy another battle of Third Age Total War between the High Elves and Mordor!

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
